import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, } from "react-bootstrap"; import products from "../products"; import Rating from '../components/Rating' function ProductScreen({ match }) { const product = products.find((p) => p._id == match.params.id); return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price ${product.price} Description{product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock >0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
); } export default ProductScreen;
